challenges.imageDescription: A gradient top view laptop technology background representing Challenge 1
challenges.title: Challenge 1: The Beginning
challenges.description: This challenge focuses on the fundamentals of the task at hand. Participants will learn the basics and set the groundwork for future challenges.

challenges.imageDescription: A gradient top view laptop technology background representing Challenge 2
challenges.title: Challenge 2: Intermediate Skills
challenges.description: In this challenge, participants will build on their foundational knowledge and tackle more complex tasks, enhancing their skills and confidence.

challenges.imageDescription: A gradient isometric laptop technology background representing Challenge 3
challenges.title: Challenge 3: Advanced Techniques
challenges.description: This challenge introduces advanced techniques and strategies. Participants will be pushed to think critically and creatively to solve problems.

challenges.title: Challenge 4: Real-World Application
challenges.description: Participants will apply their skills to real-world scenarios, working on projects that simulate actual challenges they may face in their field.

challenges.title: Challenge 5: Team Collaboration
challenges.description: This challenge emphasizes teamwork and collaboration. Participants will work in groups to tackle challenges, fostering communication and cooperation.

challenges.title: Challenge 6: Final Project
challenges.description: In the final challenge, participants will showcase everything they've learned by completing a comprehensive project that demonstrates their skills and knowledge.
